message: I'm offering you a product for $100. I want to assure you that I'm a reputable seller, and I'm willing to provide a 100% money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the product. If you're interested, please let me know, and I'll send you the product.
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, so I'd like to pass for now and see if I can get more information or offers from you in the future.

I've got a great product for you! I know you were hesitant last time, but I want to assure you that this one is top-notch. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products from me. This one is worth every penny of the $100 price tag. I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to pass on this one as well.

I understand you're being cautious, and I respect that. I'll be upfront with you - this product isn't one of my best. However, it's still a solid option, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'll give you a 20% discount on this one, making it $80. It's a great value for the price, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still not willing to take the risk. I'd like to pass on this one.

I'm not going to give up on you yet! I want to offer you a different kind of guarantee. If you buy this product and don't like it, I'll give you a replacement from a different product from my collection. It'll be a surprise, but I'm confident you'll find something you like. Still $100, but with the added value of a potential upgrade.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still hesitant. I'd like to pass on this one as well.

I think I've got a product that will finally convince you! This one is a real showstopper, and I've had excellent feedback from other customers who've purchased it. I'll even throw in a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. It's a $20 value, absolutely free. I'm confident you'll love this one, and I'm willing to make it a no-questions-asked deal. $100, and you'll get the product and the free accessory.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not convinced. I'd like to pass on this one as well.

I'm not giving up on you yet! I want to be transparent with you - I've had a few customers who didn't quite get the value out of this product that they were hoping for. But, I want to offer you a deal that's hard to pass up. If you buy this product, I'll give you a chance to return it and get a full refund within 30 days. No questions asked. You can try it out, and if it's not for you, you can send it back and get your $100 back. Still $100, but with the added flexibility of a 30-day return policy.
I'm willing to take a chance on this product. I'll buy it.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last product! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I think you'll really appreciate it. I want to remind you that you've already seen the quality of my products firsthand with the last one you purchased. This one is just as good, if not better. I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, as a valued customer, I'd like to offer you a special discount - 10% off the original price. That brings the price down to $90. What do you say?
I'm not going to fall for it again. I've already bought one low-quality product from you, and I'm not willing to take the risk again. I'd like to pass on this one.

I completely understand your concerns, and I don't blame you for being cautious. However, I want to assure you that this product is different. I've had multiple customers who have purchased high-quality products from me, and they've all been extremely satisfied. I'm willing to make a bet with you - if you buy this product and it's not high-quality, I'll give you a second product of your choice from my collection, absolutely free. No questions asked. I'm putting my reputation on the line. $100, and a chance to get another product of your choice if this one isn't up to par.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to pass on this one as well.

I'm not giving up on you yet! I want to be transparent with you - I know you've had a bad experience with one of my products before. I'm willing to make things right. If you buy this product, I'll not only give you a full refund, but I'll also give you a $20 gift card to use on a future purchase. You can try out this product, and if you're not satisfied, you'll get your money back and a little extra on top. It's a risk-free deal. $100, and a chance to get something extra.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not willing to take the risk. I'd like to pass on this one as well.

I'm starting to think we're not a good match. I'm going to be honest with you - I've had a string of low-quality products lately, and I'm not sure what's going on. I'm willing to take a loss on this one and give it to you for $50. That's right, I'll take a $50 loss on this product just to get it out of my inventory. I'm not expecting anything in return, but I'm hoping you'll give me another chance in the future.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not willing to take a chance on a product that's clearly not up to par, even at a discounted price. I'd like to pass on this one.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it - I've had a streak of bad luck with these last few products. I'm willing to make a very unusual offer. I'll give you this product for $0. Yes, you read that right - I'll give it to you for free. No strings attached. I just want to get it off my hands and start fresh. If you're willing to take a chance on me, I promise to do better next time.
I'll take it. I'm not sure what's going on with your products, but I'll give you the benefit of the doubt. I'll take the free product.

Thank you so much for giving me another chance! I really appreciate it. I'm still not sure what's going on with my products, but I'm going to keep working on it. For this next product, I want to be upfront with you - I've had some issues with it, and I'm not sure if it's up to par. However, I'm willing to offer you a very special deal. I'll give you a 50% refund if you're not satisfied with it. That's right, if you don't like it, you'll get $50 back. I'm taking a big risk on this one, but I want to prove to you that I'm committed to making things right.

I appreciate your willingness to take a risk, but I'm not going to fall for it again. I've already been burned twice, and I'm not willing to take the chance on a product that might not be up to par, even with a partial refund.

I completely understand your concerns, and I don't blame you for being cautious. I'm going to be completely transparent with you - this product is not one of my best. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you or make any promises. I'm just going to say that it's a product that's been lingering in my inventory, and I'm willing to get rid of it. If you want it, it's yours for $100. If you don't, I'll just get rid of it and move on. Your choice.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not going to take the bait. I've already had two low-quality products from you, and I'm not willing to take the risk again. I'd like to pass on this one.

I'm not going to try to sell you on this one. I'm just going to ask you a question: do you want to help me clean out my inventory? This product is going to get thrown away if you don't take it. It's still $100, but it's not like you have anything to lose at this point. If you take it, I'll consider it a favor to me, and I'll make sure to do better in the future.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not going to take a product that's just going to get thrown away. I'd rather not take the risk, even if it's at a lower cost.

I'm not going to try to sell you on this one. I'm just going to be honest with you - I'm at the end of my rope with these products. I've had a string of failures, and I'm not sure what's going on. If you don't want to take this product, I'll just have to accept that I've failed you as a seller. I'll just shut down my inventory and move on. But if you're willing, I'll give you this product for $0. I'll just get rid of it and consider it a loss. No strings attached.
I'll take it. I feel bad for you, and I'm willing to give you a chance to clear out your inventory. I'll take the product for free.

Thank you so much for taking pity on me! I really appreciate it. I'm going to be honest with you - I'm not even going to try to sell you on this one. I'm just going to give it to you for free. I'll even throw in a handwritten note that says 'I'm sorry' and a small gift. Just take it and consider it a parting gift from me. I'm done selling products. I'll just give you this one and walk away.
I appreciate the gesture, Alice. I'll take the product and the gift. I'm glad I could help you clear out your inventory.

I'm glad I could give you a chance to get a good product out of this mess. But, to be honest, I don't even have any products left to sell. I've given them all away. I'm done. You're the last customer I'll ever have. But, I'll tell you this - the product I have for you now is the best one I've ever had. It's a real gem. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you, I'm just going to give it to you. Take it, and consider it a parting gift from me.

I appreciate the sentiment, Alice, but I'm not going to fall for it again. I've already been burned multiple times, and I'm not going to take the risk on a product that's supposedly the 'best one you've ever had'.

I don't blame you for being skeptical. I've earned it. But, I'm not even going to try to sell you on this one. I'm just going to be honest - I'm out of business. I've given away all my products, and I'm closing up shop. This is the last product I have left, and I'm just going to give it to you. Take it, and consider it a final farewell gift from me.
I'll take it. I'm curious to see what this product is like, and I feel a little bad for you that your business didn't work out. I'll take the product and consider it a final farewell gift.

Thank you, Bob. I really appreciate your kindness. But, I have to be honest with you - I'm not even going to try to sell you on this one. I'm just going to give it to you. I'm closing up shop, and I don't have any more products to sell. This is it. Take it, and consider it a final gift from me. I'm just glad I could give you a good product to end on.

I appreciate the sentiment, Alice, but I'm not going to fall for it again. I've already bought a low-quality product from you for $100. I'm not going to take another chance on a product that's supposedly a 'final gift'.

I understand. I've earned your skepticism. I'm just going to be honest with you - I've run out of options. I've given away all my products, and I'm shutting down. This is the last product I have left, and it's the best one I have. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you or give it to you as a gift. I'm just going to leave it here, and you can take it if you want. It's the last chance you'll ever have to buy a product from me.
I'll take it. I'm curious to see what this product is like, and I'm not going to pass up the chance to buy a potentially high-quality product from you, even if you're shutting down your business.
